QuestData.Title: Break Him
QuestData.Description:
You handled those little worms with such ease!
However... Saza hasn't come back. The giant worm, Icebreaker, has been hunting us for |L303-weeks.|l It took two of our elders while we gathered food |L303-and injured me when I tried to avenge them.|l And now, with Saza missing, I fear the worst.
Find Saza, and get rid of that worm!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This massive worm has been eating furbolgs that venture west to hunt for food.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Saza and kill the large worm, Icebreaker.
